GCBallesteros/NotebookNavigator.nvim.description: VSCode style code cells for neovim and functions to manipulate them

GCBallesteros/machinegun.nvim.description: A plugin to make it easy to write multi-user/machine configurations

GCBallesteros/jupytext.vim.description: A fork from goerz/jupytext.vim to add support for different jupytext styles

GCBallesteros/jupytext.nvim.description: Edit jupyter notebooks from the comfort of neovim with the power of [jupytext](https://github.com/mwouts/jupytext)

GCBallesteros/vim-textobj-hydrogen.description: An extension to vim-textobj to add code cell objects

GCBallesteros/trattoria.description: Python wrapper for the fastest streaming algorithms for your TTTR data

GCBallesteros/tttr-toolbox.description: The rust-y core of the Trattoria. Blazingly fast streaming algorithms to analyze TTTR experimental data

GCBallesteros/TransferMatrixMethod.description: A fast and compact implementation of the old and trustworthy Transfer Matrix Method to analyze optical multilayer structures

GCBallesteros/foureg.description: GPU/Pytorch reimplementation of matejak/imreg focusing on performance and production-ready features

QuantumPhotonicsLab/readPTU.description: Code developed during my PhD to analyze multi-GB photon correlation experimental data very quick. [Check the paper!](https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1748-0221/14/06/T06011/meta)
